caseStudy.title: Los Marineros
caseStudy.subtitle: featured case study
caseStudy.description: Los Marineros, a premium yacht manufacturer based in Barcelona, sought a brand refresh, new website, and an immersive 3D configurator for customers. Our goal was to blend luxury and digital innovation to match their brand legacy.

description: We revamped their web experience with cinematic visuals, an interactive boat builder, and multilingual support targeting high-net-worth customers.
Mobile optimization and SEO upgrades led to significant traffic growth and longer user engagement.
Custom backend built for seamless inventory, lead tracking, and CRM integration.
Partnered with marine lifestyle photographers to generate compelling content for social media and brochures.
Designed a 3D configurator with WebGL for real-time yacht customization.
Integrated secure checkout and inquiry flow with HubSpot CRM.

process.title: Our design process
process.description: From research to real-world testing, our process ensured seamless UX and brand fidelity.

strategies.title: Structure
strategies.subtitle: our four step process
strategies.description: Defined IA and component libraries with Figma.

strategies.title: Panneling
strategies.subtitle: our four step process
strategies.description: Created modular UI systems for boat interiors.

strategies.title: Interior Design
strategies.subtitle: our four step process
strategies.description: Rendered realistic interiors using Blender and React Three Fiber.

strategies.title: Final Finishing
strategies.subtitle: our four step process
strategies.description: Launched with SEO tuning, A/B testing, and analytics dashboard.
